SECTION.description: Independent UI unit (Liquid + JSON Schema + CSS).

TEMPLATE.description: Top-level page template wiring sections together.

TOKEN.description: Design token (color, spacing, font, motion) defined in design_tokens.json.

SIGNAL.description: JS event used for decoupled communication.

UX_PATTERN.description: UX interface pattern (cards, layout, form flow).

CRO_PATTERN.description: Conversion pattern (sticky ATC, progress bar, social proof block).

ARCHETYPE.description: E-commerce customer archetype (luxury, bargain hunter, tech buyer).

BEHAVIOR_PATTERN.description: Behavior rule or bias affecting user decisions.

ERROR.description: Detected issue in code, UX, performance or security.

TASK.description: Unit of work for AI or human (feature, fix, refactor).
